summary: The diff implements all four requirements with a Dictionary tab, backend word storage, search interface, and Web Speech API pronunciation. However, the backend contains no dictionary data (empty wordMap), falling short of the 250,000+ words requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend stores a comprehensive dictionary dataset with 250,000+ words
missing_requirements.reason: The backend wordMap is initialized as empty (Map.empty<Text, Word>()) with no dictionary data loading or pre-population. The migration also creates an empty wordMap. Without 250,000+ words loaded, the backend requirement is not met.
